TITLE: A group of banks are in talks to deposit $30 billion in First Republic, sources say
SUMMARY: The news comes after First Republic's stock has been pummeled in recent days, sparked by the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank.

TITLE: European Central Bank hikes rates despite market mayhem, pledges support if needed
SUMMARY: Some market players questioned whether President Christine Lagarde would proceed with a hike, given recent shocks in the banking sector.

TITLE: French President Macron overrides parliament to pass retirement age bill
SUMMARY: French President Emmanuel Macron invoked special constitutional powers to push the bill through.

TITLE: Credit Suisse shares soar over 18% on Swiss National Bank loan announcement
SUMMARY: Credit Suisse shares rose over 30% at the market open after the bank said that it will borrow up to $54 billion from the Swiss National Bank.

TITLE: UK bans TikTok on government devices following U.S. move
SUMMARY: The United Kingdom on Thursday announced plans to ban the Chinese-owned video app TikTok on government devices.

TITLE: 'The weakest links are cracking': Investors consider possible Credit Suisse contagion
SUMMARY: Even before the shock collapse of two U.S. banks, Credit Suisse had faced a slew of problems, including money laundering charges and spying allegations.

TITLE: Cocaine production is at its highest level on record, UN says
SUMMARY: Despite continued efforts by law enforcement to crack down on cocaine use, global demand for the drug has only grown.

TITLE: Chinese tourists are traveling again — but not the way they used to
SUMMARY: In China, as elsewhere, the pandemic has sparked a shift in tourist behaviors, namely a preference for outdoor destinations and domestic travel.

TITLE: A longevity expert shares the exercise she does to live longer and prevent her body from 'aging fast'
SUMMARY: Stress isn't always bad for you, studies show. In fact, it can slow the aging process, in the right circumstances. Psychiatrist and bestselling author Dr. Elissa Epel shares how short-term stress exercises can help you live longer.

TITLE: HSBC bought Silicon Valley Bank UK in record time — here's how events unfolded
SUMMARY: The CEO of HSBC UK said he would not have guessed — just a few days beforehand — that it would be buying Silicon Valley Bank UK.

TITLE: TikTok confirms the U.S. has threatened ban if Chinese parent ByteDance doesn't sell stake
SUMMARY: The U.S. has a number of concerns about TikTok and has maintained the Chinese-owned app presents a national security risk.

TITLE: Bank shares rebound off lows as big banks consider coming to the aid of First Republic
SUMMARY: The collapse of Silicon Valley Bank last Friday has left investors scrambling to identify other regional banks that have similar balance sheet issues.

TITLE: Baidu shares drop to 8-week lows after company reveals ChatGPT rival
SUMMARY: Chinese tech company Baidu gave the public a peek Thursday at what its Chinese-language ChatGPT alternative can do, while warning of its imperfections.

TITLE: Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi plans expansion after Beijing's crackdown on the firm ends
SUMMARY: The Beijing-headquartered company said in an online statement that it plans to work with partners in 2023 to launch more diversified products and services.

TITLE: Saudi National Bank says panic over Credit Suisse is 'unwarranted'
SUMMARY: "It's panic, a little bit of panic. I believe completely unwarranted, whether it be for Credit Suisse or for the entire market," he said on CNBC's "Capital Connection."

TITLE: As bank crisis spreads, Cramer says the Fed may need to take drastic measures
SUMMARY: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Wednesday said the Federal Reserve may need to take drastic measures, which could be "fantastic" for your portfolio.

TITLE: China sees record 7.7 million applicants for 200,000 government jobs
SUMMARY: Government jobs are typically regarded as stable and prestigious in China, especially since young people's unemployment has soared to record highs.

TITLE: Southeast Asia VC firms could see a larger impact from SVB fallout than startups
SUMMARY: Some VC firms could face challenges in finding another bank that offers the same product offering as Silicon Valley Bank.

TITLE: A recession could come sooner on cooling bank lending
SUMMARY: Plummeting bond yields, and steep drops in oil and stock prices are all signaling that investors fear a recession is now on the near horizon.

TITLE: DOJ charges Chinese businessman Guo Wengui, associate of Steve Bannon, in $1 billion fraud
SUMMARY: Prosecutors accused Guo Wengui, an associate of former Trump White House advisor Steve Bannon, of a large conspiracy that duped his online followers.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs cuts GDP forecast because of stress on small banks, which are key to U.S. economy
SUMMARY: Goldman on Wednesday lowered its 2023 economic growth forecast, citing a pullback in lending from small- and medium-sized banks.

TITLE: Virgin Orbit pauses operations for a week, furloughs nearly entire staff as it seeks funding
SUMMARY: Virgin Orbit is furloughing nearly all its employees and pausing operations for a week as it looks for a funding lifeline.

TITLE: Samsung to spend $228 billion on the world's largest chip facility as part of South Korea tech plan
SUMMARY: Samsung Electronics said Wednesday it plans to invest 300 trillion Korean won ($228 billion) in a new semiconductor complex in South Korea.

TITLE: Apple supplier Foxconn expects decline in consumer electronics demand, prioritizes global growth
SUMMARY: Foxconn, a major iPhone supplier and Apple vendor, warned that it expected a decline in consumer electronics demand in the coming year.

TITLE: Stripe slashes valuation to $50 billion in new $6.5 billion funding round
SUMMARY: Payment processor Stripe raised $6.5 billion, largely to provide liquidity to current and former employees, but at a sharply discounted $50 billion valuation.

TITLE: Bitcoin is already up 50% this year — beating stocks and gold
SUMMARY: On Jan. 1, bitcoin began trading at just over $16,500. On Wednesday, it was hovering around the $25,000 mark, thanks to a rally that began on Sunday.

TITLE: College hopefuls have a new ultimate dream school — and it's not Harvard, Princeton or Yale
SUMMARY: As National College Decision Day approaches, most of the colleges at the top of students' wish lists are among the most selective and most expensive.

TITLE: Google ends enterprise sales of Google Glass, its augmented reality smartglasses
SUMMARY: It's the end of the line for Google Glass, one of the first -- and most-recognized -- smart glasses products from a big tech company.

TITLE: In client call, SVB's new CEO urges clients to bring funds back to the bank
SUMMARY: Silicon Valley Bank's new CEO Tim Mayopoulos pitched venture and startup clients hard to help keep the bank alive in a 30-minute call.

TITLE: The China-brokered Saudi-Iran deal has big repercussions for the Middle East — and the U.S.
SUMMARY: The deal is "a much needed pressure valve amid heightened regional tensions" — but significant changes are far from guaranteed, analysts told CNBC.
